CustomField.description: This field is used to indicate type of case whether it is Order Cancellation Case, General Inquiry Case
CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.Name, 'General Inquiry','General Inquiry Case', 'Order Cancellation Case','Order Cancellation Case', 'CarePlan','CarePlan Case','CareGap','CareGap Case', '')
CustomField.label: Case Type
